item.description:
It is a well known fact of marketing that is cheaper for people to find you than for you to find them.

 

This is called inbound marketing, aka content marketing.

 

At this event, Bill Belew, graduate school professor of Marketing with Social Media and problogger (more than 120 million page views all via search) and in a dozen niches will teach us the power of a dynamic website.

 

His colleague, Kevin Carney, will discuss from real-life case studies effective conversion strategies.

 

Key takeaways:

1. How to make your website a lead generating machine

2. How to convert search visitors to your site into active and paying customers.

 

No nonsense. No fluff. No theory. This webinar presentation is about what works and what doesn't.

 

https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7521473522520567552
item.name: Webinar: Lead Generation System
